job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the development of automations powered by AI, which falls under building and deploying software solutions.
Setting up workflows implies building and integrating automated processes, a core part of software development.
This directly refers to the utilization and application of generative AI models, which is a form of modeling.
This clearly describes the creation and maintenance of web applications, a fundamental software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: creëert en onderhoudt schaalbare webapplicaties met no-code tools
job_tasks.justification: Building and maintaining scalable web applications, even with no-code tools, is part of software development and deployment.
Designing integrations between systems involves software development principles for connecting different components.
Connecting systems implies building interfaces and ensuring data flow, which is a software development task.
Advising clients and colleagues on the best approach involves understanding business needs and translating them into technical solutions.
Combining AI and automation solutions points to the application and integration of models for specific purposes.

job_tasks.phrase: tot écht innovatieve toepassingen te komen
job_tasks.justification: Developing innovative applications by combining AI and automation is a form of applied modeling.
This often involves debugging and optimizing AI/automation solutions, which can be considered a form of problem-solving within modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: duikt graag de techniek in om bottlenecks te achterhalen en creatieve workarounds te bedenken
job_tasks.justification: Troubleshooting and finding creative solutions within the technical implementation of AI and automations relates to the practical application and refinement of models.

soft_skills.phrase: duikt graag de techniek in om bottlenecks te achterhalen en creatieve workarounds te bedenken

classification.rationale: The role heavily emphasizes developing automations using generative AI models like OpenAI and Claude, aligning with the definition of a GenAI Engineer. While it mentions no-code tools and integrations, the core focus on applying and integrating generative AI models for various applications is the dominant theme.
